headline: Teamsters Lawsuit Puts UPS Driver Choice Overhaul And Job Cuts In Focus
summary: The International Brotherhood of Teamsters has filed a lawsuit against United Parcel Service over the planned Driver Choice Program. The union is also seeking an emergency court order to halt the rollout, arguing the program violates the national labor contract. UPS faces allegations that the program could require drivers to waive key rights and is tied to plans to cut up to 30,000 jobs in 2026. For investors watching NYSE:UPS, this dispute comes as the stock trades around $119.24, with a...
